title: SELF HELP Because I Don't Have A Clue How To
description: Why do we DREAM BIG but in the same breath decide our lives can’t really change? How can we fervently believe in the affirmations of POSITIVE GOALS, PERSONAL SUCCESS, and even TRANSFORMATION, and in a heartbeat, place each under the heading “Wishful thinking?Why do we continually talk ourselves out of grand possibilities? What is the True Meaning of Life?Why on earth would someone, with a Dry, Off Beat, sense of humor, ever attempted to answer such lofty questions?Because It Was There???SELF HELP takes us on a Tongue In Cheek journey, toward discovery! Michael R. Hopson will help you uncover answers to questions not yet asked. Discover what is most likely blocking you from personal success. And assist you in creating a tangible reminder that, above all else, you are in charge. It's time to create a new perspective, and take steps toward living the life you dream of.Or at least read a not so serious book about the subject!
author: Michael R. Hopson
